subproblems.subproblem_question:
[10 points] Convert the following Boolean equation so that it only contains NOR operations. Show your work step-by-step.

F = A+ (B.C +A.C)
subproblems.subproblem_solution:
F = ((A+A+ (B.C +A.C)) + ((A+A+ (B.C +A.C))

B.C = B +B + C + C

A.C = A+A+ C + C + C + C

Explanation:

F = ((A+ (B.C +A.C))

F = ((A+ (B.C +A.C)) + ((A+ (B.C +A.C))

F = ((A+A+ (B.C +A.C)) + ((A+A+ (B.C +A.C))
